tech.name: Plasma Spray
tech.description: Leads to the Improved Structural Maintenance Program. Structure maintenance cost is reduced by 5%.

tech.name: Plasma Gasification
tech.description: Leads to Improved Waste Recycling and Slag Reprocessing. Recycling return rate improved by 5%.

tech.name: Plasma Electrolytic Oxidation
tech.description: Leads to the Improved Structural Maintenance Program. Structure maintenance cost is reduced by 5%.

tech.name: Plasma Polymerization
tech.description: Allows for the production of Advanced Synthetic Materials. Reduces structure decay rate by 10%.

tech.name: Smelter Mark II
tech.description: With our breakthroughs in Metallurgy and Miner Processing, our scientists and egineers have proposed a new Smelter design that's much more efficient than the design we have from Earth.

tech.name: Photovoltaic Cells
tech.description: With the knowledge we've gained of building semiconductors in our new environment, our engineers have proposed a new version of the Solar Panel Array that can generate more energy in the specific conditions of our new planet.

tech.name: Mineralogy
tech.description: Scientific discipline that is concerned with all aspects of our new planet's minerals, including their physical properties, chemical composition, internal crystal structure, and occurrence and distribution

tech.name: Electronics
tech.description: It won't be long before our computer and electronics equipment starts to fail. We need to investigate methods of build new electronic components and circuits with the local materials of our new planet.

tech.name: Basic Robotics
tech.description: Pass-through study that allows for the development of new robots.

tech.name: Advanced Robotics
tech.description: Allows for the development of advanced robotics.

tech.name: Humanoid Workers
tech.description: Advanced robots that can perform the functions of humans.

tech.name: Solar Physics
tech.description: The study of our new host star and its behavior. Required to predict solar storm activity.

tech.name: Solar Storm Prediction
tech.description: Allows for prediction of solar storm events such as Solar Flares and Coronal Mass Ejections that could cause damage to surface electronics and/or bath our new home's surface in ionizing radiation.

tech.name: Basic Astronomy
tech.description: Sets up the basis for our understanding of our new celestial neighborhood.

tech.name: Celestial Mechanics
tech.description: The studia of the motion of the celestial bodies in our new solar neighborhood.

tech.name: Oribtal Mechanics
tech.description: Orbital mechanics is the application of ballistics and Celestial Mechanics to the practical problems concerning the motion of rockets and other spacecraft. Orbital mechanics provides a foundation for us to design and deploy new spacecraft and space technologies.
